attributes.action: Change In immigration policy and National Immigration Census
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition for a change in our immigration rules to protect our culture and life style as no other country allows or encourages so many immigrants, there also should be a national census of immigrants to get a realistic number of immigrants in this country as the public believe government figures are inaccurate.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
